content.query:
USE electric_vehicle_ldw;

-- Create "vehicle" Table
IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.vehicle') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.vehicle;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.vehicle
    ( 
        vehicle_id           INT,
        vin                  VARCHAR(10),
        model_year           SMALLINT,
        make                 VARCHAR(25),
        model                VARCHAR(25),
        electric_range       SMALLINT,
        base_MSRP            INT,
        vehiche_type_id      SMALLINT,
        cafv_eligibility_id  SMALLINT,
        vehicle_location     VARCHAR(30)
    )
    WITH (
        LOCATION = 'bronze/vehicle.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = electric_vehicle_src,
        FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format,
        REJECT_VALUE = 10,
        REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION = 'rejections/vehicle'
    );

SELECT * FROM bronze.vehicle;


-- Create "calendar" Table
IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.calendar') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.calendar;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.calendar
    ( 
        date_key        INT,
        date            DATE,
        year            SMALLINT,
        month           TINYINT,
        day             TINYINT,
        month_name      VARCHAR(10),
        day_name        VARCHAR(10),
        day_of_year     SMALLINT,
        week_of_month   TINYINT,
        week_of_year    TINYINT
    )
    WITH (
        LOCATION = 'bronze/calendar.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = electric_vehicle_src,
        FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format_v2,
        REJECT_VALUE = 10,
        REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION = 'rejections/calendar'  
    );

SELECT * FROM bronze.calendar;


-- Create "location" Table
IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.location') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.location;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.location
    ( 
        location_id             SMALLINT,
        county                  VARCHAR(30),
        city                    VARCHAR(30),
        state                   VARCHAR(2),
        postal_code             VARCHAR(5),
        legislative_district    VARCHAR(2),
        census_tract            VARCHAR(11)
    )
    WITH (
        LOCATION = 'bronze/location.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = electric_vehicle_src,
        FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format_v3,
        REJECT_VALUE = 10,
        REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION = 'rejections/location'  
    );

SELECT * FROM bronze.location;


-- Create "propietary" Table
IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.propietary') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.propietary;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.propietary
    ( 
        propietary_id       TINYINT,
        electric_utility    VARCHAR(120)
    )
    WITH (
        LOCATION = 'bronze/propietary.tsv',
        DATA_SOURCE = electric_vehicle_src,
        FILE_FORMAT = tsv_file_format,
        REJECT_VALUE = 10,
        REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION = 'rejections/propietary'  
    );

SELECT * FROM bronze.propietary;


-- Create "vehicle_registration_csv" Table
IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.vehicle_registration_csv') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.vehicle_registration_csv;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.vehicle_registration_csv
    ( 
        vehicle_id          INT,
        location_id         SMALLINT,
        propietary_id       TINYINT,
        dol_vehicle_id      INT,
        registration_date   DATETIME2(7)
    )
    WITH (
        LOCATION = 'bronze/vehicle_registration_csv/**',
        DATA_SOURCE = electric_vehicle_src,
        FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format
    );

SELECT TOP(100) * FROM bronze.vehicle_registration_csv
WHERE year(registration_date) = 2025 AND month(registration_date) = 2;


-- Create "vehicle_registration_parquet" Table
IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.vehicle_registration_parquet') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.vehicle_registration_parquet;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.vehicle_registration_parquet
    ( 
        vehicleId          INT,
        locationId         SMALLINT,
        propietaryId       TINYINT,
        dolVehicleId       INT,
        registrationDate   DATETIME2(7)
    )
    WITH (
        LOCATION = 'bronze/vehicle_registration_parquet/**',
        DATA_SOURCE = electric_vehicle_src,
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
    );

SELECT TOP(100) * FROM bronze.vehicle_registration_parquet;


-- Create "vehicle_registration_delta" Table
IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.vehicle_registration_delta') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.vehicle_registration_delta;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.vehicle_registration_delta
    ( 
        vehicleId          INT,
        locationId         SMALLINT,
        propietaryId       TINYINT,
        dolVehicleId       INT,
        registrationDate   DATETIME2(7)
    )
    WITH (
        LOCATION = 'bronze/vehicle_registration_delta',
        DATA_SOURCE = electric_vehicle_src,
        FILE_FORMAT = delta_file_format
    );

SELECT TOP(100) * FROM bronze.vehicle_registration_delta;
